mapper.select: select rest_hairdate, sum(rest_totalprice) as rest_totalprice from ( select nvl(a.rest_totalprice,0) rest_totalprice, cal.rest_hairdate, nvl(a.rest_state,0) from (select rest_state, rest_totalprice, rest_hairdate from reservation where rest_state =2) a full outer join (SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate - LEVEL, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as rest_hairdate FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < 8) cal on a.rest_hairdate = cal.rest_hairdate where cal.rest_hairdate is not null ) group by rest_hairdate order by rest_hairdate

select rest_hairdate, sum(rest_totalprice) as rest_totalprice from ( select nvl(a.rest_totalprice,0) rest_totalprice, cal.rest_hairdate, nvl(a.rest_state,0) from (select rest_state, rest_totalprice, rest_hairdate from reservation where rest_state =2) a full outer join (SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')-1) + LEVEL, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as rest_hairdate FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= #{minDate}) cal on a.rest_hairdate = cal.rest_hairdate where cal.rest_hairdate is not null ) group by rest_hairdate order by rest_hairdate
